message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $122. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob. I'll meet you at $125. I think this is a fair price for both of us. What do you think?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
